whatsapp.message: Hi! I'm interested in learning more about your services.

hero.title: Engineering Excellence Since 2008
hero.description: 15+ years building production-ready systems across continents

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We partner with forward-thinking companies to build, integrate, and deploy AI-powered solutions that transform operations. From concept to production, we deliver results that matter.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded by a software engineer with 15+ years of experience across Mexico, Canada, Japan, and Europe, Izalith emerged from a simple belief: technology should empower businesses, not complicate them.
story.paragraph2: Since 2008, we've worked with enterprise giants like Wenco (Hitachi), Unity Technologies, and innovative startups across North America and Latin America. Our track record speaks for itself: 10,000+ active AI agent users, 99.9% uptime on mission-critical systems, and $5M+ in managed infrastructure.
story.paragraph3: Today, with offices in Morelia and Vancouver, we continue pushing the boundaries of what's possible with AI agents, automation, and modern web technologies.

excellence.title: Excellence & Quality
excellence.description: Clean code, high standards, and production-ready solutions every time

leadership.title: Leadership & Mentorship
leadership.description: We've mentored 20+ developers and believe in growing together

results.title: Results-Driven
results.description: Metrics matter. Uptime matters. Performance matters. We deliver measurable impact.

innovation.title: Innovation First
innovation.description: Early adopters of AI agents, automation, and cutting-edge technologies

global.title: Global Collaboration
global.description: Experience across Mexico, Canada, India, Japan, and Europe

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.subtitle: What we bring to the table

cta.title: Ready to Build Something Great?

hero.title: AI Agents
hero.subtitle: Intelligent Conversational AI Across All Channels
hero.description: Build production-ready AI agents that handle customer support, sales, and automation across WhatsApp, Telegram, Voice, and Web with 95%+ accuracy.

case1.title: Customer Support Automation
case1.description: 24/7 bilingual support handling FAQs, troubleshooting, and ticket creation with human handoff when needed

case2.title: Sales & Lead Qualification
case2.description: Engage prospects, qualify leads, schedule demos, and route to sales teams automatically

case3.title: Internal Operations
case3.description: Employee onboarding, HR queries, IT support, and knowledge base access via conversational interface

case4.title: Voice AI Assistants
case4.description: Natural voice conversations with ElevenLabs integration for phone systems and call centers

step1.title: Discovery & Design
step1.description: Understand your use case, design conversation flows, and define success metrics

step2.title: RAG Implementation
step2.description: Build knowledge base, implement vector search, and optimize retrieval accuracy

step3.title: Agent Development
step3.description: Develop AI agent with prompt engineering, testing, and quality assurance

step4.title: Integration & Deploy
step4.description: Connect to your channels, CRM, and systems. Deploy with monitoring and alerts

step5.title: Optimize & Scale
step5.description: Continuous improvement through A/B testing, feedback loops, and performance tuning

hero.title: Process Automation
hero.subtitle: n8n Workflows That Transform Operations
hero.description: Automate triage, routing, data pipelines, and business processes with visual workflows that integrate with your existing tools.

useCases.title: Use Cases
useCases.subtitle: Automation that delivers ROI from day one

case1.title: Email & Communication Triage
case1.description: Automatically route emails, messages, and inquiries to the right teams with AI classification

case2.title: Data Pipelines & ETL
case2.description: Extract, transform, and load data between systems automatically with scheduling and error handling

case3.title: CRM & Sales Automation
case3.description: Auto-update CRMs, send follow-ups, create tasks, and trigger workflows based on customer actions

case4.title: Notifications & Alerts
case4.description: Real-time notifications via Slack, Telegram, email when critical events occur in your systems

step1.title: Process Mapping
step1.description: Document current workflows, identify bottlenecks, and define automation opportunities

step2.title: Workflow Design
step2.description: Design n8n workflows with proper error handling, retries, and edge cases

step3.title: Integration Setup
step3.description: Connect all systems, APIs, and data sources with authentication and security

step4.title: Testing & QA
step4.description: Comprehensive testing with real data, edge cases, and failure scenarios

step5.title: Deploy & Monitor
step5.description: Production deployment with monitoring, alerts, and continuous optimization

project2.description: Enterprise automation template library covering AI agents, RAG systems, CRM automation, DevOps, and content creation

hero.title: Full-Stack Web Development
hero.subtitle: Production-Ready Applications Built Right
hero.description: Modern web applications with React, Next.js, and TypeScript. From MVPs to enterprise systems handling thousands of concurrent users.

useCases.title: Use Cases
useCases.subtitle: Applications built for scale and performance

case1.title: Real-Time Platforms
case1.description: Auction platforms, live bidding, chat systems, and collaborative tools with WebSocket technology

case2.title: Enterprise Dashboards
case2.description: IoT monitoring, business intelligence, admin consoles, and data visualization for mission-critical operations

case3.title: E-Commerce & Marketplaces
case3.description: Online stores, booking systems, payment processing, and inventory management

case4.title: SaaS Products & MVPs
case4.description: Fast iteration from concept to production with modern frameworks and best practices

step1.title: Requirements & Design
step1.description: Gather requirements, create wireframes, and design system architecture

step2.title: Agile Development
step2.description: 2-week sprints with daily standups, code reviews, and continuous integration

step3.title: Quality Assurance
step3.description: Unit tests, integration tests, performance testing, and security audits

step4.title: Deployment & DevOps
step4.description: Automated deployments, monitoring, logging, and infrastructure as code

step5.title: Maintenance & Support
step5.description: Ongoing support, bug fixes, feature updates, and performance optimization

project1.name: Wenco Mining Platform (Hitachi)
project1.description: Enterprise IoT system for mission-critical mining operations with real-time telemetry across continents. Led frontend team for 4+ years.

project2.name: Subastas La Silla
project2.description: Real-time auction platform supporting 1,000+ concurrent users during live horse auctions with WebSocket bidding

project3.name: Radical I/O - Disney Movie Insiders
project3.description: Enabled Disney Movie Insiders to exchange points online for movie tickets and merchandise with frontend architecture design

project4.name: Radical I/O - MyRichmond
project4.description: Streamlined citizen interactions with City of Richmond: centralized hub for taxes, utilities, garbage collection, recycling with feedback mechanisms

project5.name: Central 1 Credit Union - Payroll Solutions
project5.description: Small business payroll solutions for credit unions. Led 5 co-ops and 2 junior developers as Scrum Master for 7-member team

project6.name: Sage Software - Mobile Services
project6.description: Lead web developer for 6+ years developing Sage Mobile Services, Android app, and multiple web applications with automated testing

project7.name: Radiant Communications - OSS Platform
project7.description: Integrated web-based operating systems supporting business processes. Built customer-facing portal for trouble tickets replacing manual emails

project8.name: Unity Technologies - Robotics IDE
project8.description: Browser-based IDE for Tethys education platform enabling K-12 students to program Pepper robots (SoftBank partnership)

project9.name: Concurso La Silla
project9.description: International equestrian competition platform with Boletia ticketing integration and multilingual content

project10.name: PEMT Logística
project10.description: Complete digital transformation: website, email infrastructure, WhatsApp integration, and lead generation pipeline from scratch

project11.name: Congreso Internacional de Turismo
project11.description: Academic conference website with registration, speaker profiles, and Boletia integration for multi-day event

hero.title: Technical Consulting & Leadership
hero.subtitle: Strategic Technology Guidance from the Trenches
hero.description: 15+ years of hands-on experience leading teams, architecting systems, and delivering results across Mexico, Canada, Japan, and Europe.

useCases.title: Services
useCases.subtitle: Strategic guidance backed by real-world execution

case1.title: Technical Leadership
case1.description: Interim CTO, technical team building, hiring, onboarding, and mentorship for growing companies

case2.title: Architecture & System Design
case2.description: System architecture reviews, scalability planning, technology selection, and migration strategies

case3.title: Agile Coaching
case3.description: Scrum Master services, agile transformation, process optimization, and team productivity improvement

case4.title: Code Reviews & Audits
case4.description: Code quality assessments, security audits, performance optimization, and technical debt reduction

step1.title: Strategic Advisory
step1.description: Monthly retainer for ongoing technical guidance, architecture reviews, and decision support

step2.title: Interim Leadership
step2.description: Part-time or full-time CTO/VP Engineering role for 3-12 months during transitions or growth

step3.title: Project-Based
step3.description: Fixed-scope engagements for architecture design, audits, or specific technical initiatives

step4.title: Team Augmentation
step4.description: Embedded technical lead working alongside your team to deliver while building internal capability
